channel.title: Esp32 on Embedded Systems Design
channel.description: Recent content in Esp32 on Embedded Systems Design

item.title: Overview of the ESP32 DevKit DOIT V1
item.description: Overview See this excellent overview of the ESP32 RX0 / TX0 are used by the onboard silabs USB/serial chip and shouldn't be used for UART in your project Devkit vs ESP32 module Pinouts / Schematics from https://randomnerdtutorials.

item.title: ESP32 Installation and Setup
item.description: Install Miniconda and packages You need to use Python on your PC to program the ESP32.

item.title: Working with Thonny
item.description: Menu & Icons File File Menu File –> Open(ctrl+o): If the ESP32 is connected it permits you to open a file either on your computer or from the ESP32’s file space.
